mapper.select: select c.*, u.user_name teacher_name from t_course c join t_user u on u.user_id = c.teacher_id join t_member m on c.course_id=m.course_id where c.teacher_id = #{userId} or m.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.course_id
select c.*, u.user_name teacher_name from t_course c, t_user u where c.course_num = #{courseNum} and u.user_id = c.teacher_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_course(course_id, course_num, clazz_name, course_name, term, synopsis, teacher_id) values(#{courseId}, #{courseNum}, #{clazzName}, #{courseName}, #{term}, #{synopsis}, #{teacherId})
